articles.title: China's export growth likely eased in Sept on electricity curbs - Reuters.com
articles.description: China's export growth likely slowed in September as electricity rationing hit production at home, while a shift in consumption towards services as developed economies reopened likely reduced global appetite for Chinese goods, a Reuters polll showed on Tuesday.
